name: places/ChIJ0fml0n5ZwokRuAiZc6HCFKE
formattedAddress: 415 E Houston St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 415 E Houston St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text:
I’ve been coming here for a few months, mostly on Fridays and Saturdays, but sometimes on other days of the week.

I enjoy sitting at the tables in back to work in a quiet environment.

On occasion, there’s been a belligerent patron or someone (I assume) who is unhoused or with mental issues who causes a commotion, but the staff and security seem to handle any issues like this quickly.

Restroom is clean.

originalText.text: I been coming here for the past 50 years & has been a big part of my life to say the least. It was recently closed for 2 years because of Covid. Now after barely over 1 year they announced they are going to be closed another 2 or 3 YEARS!!!!  I have a feeling they are never opening up again!! They might be phasing it out for good. I'm disabled. & there's no such thing as a nearby library. What's an old man to do?

text.text: I been coming here for the past 50 years & has been a big part of my life to say the least. It was recently closed for 2 years because of Covid. Now after barely over 1 year they announced they are going to be closed another 2 or 3 YEARS!!!!  I have a feeling they are never opening up again!! They might be phasing it out for good. I'm disabled. & there's no such thing as a nearby library. What's an old man to do?

originalText.text: I had a fantastic experience at this library! It's a cozy, one-floor library with an impressive book selection. They recently remodeled and it looks amazing. The staff is consistently helpful and accommodating. If you can't find a particular book, they're more than willing to order it for you. Printing from the computers is available, and while they do charge 15 cents per page, it's reasonable and convenient. The bathrooms are typically clean and readily accessible, which is always a plus. I was particularly impressed by the well-maintained teen and children's sections - they're clean, organized, and create a welcoming environment for young readers. Overall, this library is a hidden gem, and I'm grateful for the positive experiences I've had there. Highly recommended!

originalText.text: I am so happy to see they have re opened. I will be in soon, I have missed you guys. Love coming here because it quite and they always have books that I want the staff is always in a great mood helpful kind and they always greet you with an open smile. I’m looking forward to seeing the new renovations.

originalText.text: The guards are great here and tries to assist with the bathroom needs as well as assisting with the noise levels. Although  the manager knows about the bathroom hear, he never cares & it is a mess. We love to come hear to study but if the manager is following us around, like we steal books, we wont come back again. Also they should have a regular clean up for the person for the restrooms & carpet. Our children deserve the best!!! #Acleanenvironmentwheretheyplay!!!!
